page.title: 09EDUCATION IN BALFRON AREA
page.content: There are 58 teachers and 27 others working in the{High School.}Despite its relatively small size, by town standards, pupils are offered a wide range of subjects and achieve very {high results}in S.C.E. Examinations. A high proportion of senior pupils go to universities and colleges. The school has a "special-unit" for handicapped children and those in need of remedial help. A wide range of{clubs,}societies, sports and pastimes are held, usually during lunch times, to suit those travelling by bus. Plays, musicals and concerts are produced and performed regularly, much to the delight of parents and friends. The school{swimming pool}is well used throughout the day by pupils and children from all local primaries are taught swimming in the summer term.
